title: The Softer of The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: The Softer of The Cigar Authority
description: It turns out Mr Jonathan's wife is not called "Mrs Jonathan"... It's Deborah Monk. She is not only a dancer, mother, wife, and a published author! The boys review her book, "Searching for Julia Stone." Also on the docket, interviews with Jim Young, President of Davidoff, and Eric Newman, President of JC Newman Cigars. We hear what these powerhouse players of the cigar industry are doing to keep the government out of your cigar budget. This is more only on The Cigar Authority!
